thread.title: Samsung's 10.4 inch Tab S6 Lite with S Pen and 7,040 mAh battery gets a whopping 49% price cut on Amazon - NotebookCheck.net News
thread.title_full: Samsung's 10.4 inch Tab S6 Lite with S Pen and 7,040 mAh battery gets a whopping 49% price cut on Amazon - NotebookCheck.net News

author: Sambit Saha
title: Samsung's 10.4 inch Tab S6 Lite with S Pen and 7,040 mAh battery gets a whopping 49% price cut on Amazon - NotebookCheck.net News
text: In the domain of budget-friendly tablets, the Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite shines as a standout option. Priced at $219.99 for the 128GB model in a current Amazon deal (originally $430) , it offers a substantial 49% discount, making it an appealing choice for those on a budget. The tablet boasts a vibrant 10.4-inch display, powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 720G processor, ensuring ample performance. Dual Dolby Atmos-certified speakers enhance the audio experience, and the 7,040 mAh battery provides an impressive 12 hours of usage on a single charge. The inclusion of the S Pen caters to the needs of creative individuals. Equipped with an 8 MP rear camera and a 5 MP front camera, the tablet offers basic photography functionality and efficient video call capabilities. The deal extends to all three colour variants: Oxford Grey, Angora Blue, and Chiffon Rose, allowing users to personalise their device. While not the newest model, the Galaxy Tab S6 Lite 's enduring value lies in its quality and performance, making it a practical choice for users prioritising affordability over the latest features. With a significant markdown on the 128 GB model, this tablet presents an excellent opportunity for those seeking a cost-effective yet high-quality device. Those interested in learning more about the tablet, can read our extensive review by clicking on this link . Disclaimer: Notebookcheck is not responsible for price changes carried out by retailers. The discounted price or deal mentioned in this item was available at the time of writing and may be subject to time restrictions and/or limited unit availability. Amazon, Samsung
